title: Tragic Umbrella
summaries: The Tragic Umbrella is a held item which can be purchased from the Clothier for 10 while in a Graveyard. While held, the Tragic Umbrella appears above the character and allows them to fall at a slower rate than normal. It is also a melee weapon, and functions exactly like the standard Umbrella, aside from dealing higher melee damage.

statistics.Tooltip: You will fall slower while holding this
